titleStmt.title: [C]atalogue of the nobility of England, according to their respective precedencies, and titles of honour they now enjoy, the first of March, 1689. And in the first year of Their Majesties reign. : To which is added the blazon of their paternal coats of arms respectively, and a list of the present bishops.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Clavell, at the Peacock in S. Pauls Church-yard; and Chr. Wilkinson, at the Black-Boy in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: "Imprimatur, March the first 1689/90. Norfolk and Marshal."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Peacock in S. Pauls Church-yard;
